description: This is an intermediate step of relic creation.

name: KnightsEmblemEmeraldBeltItem
description: While wearing this belt a monk can spend 1 ki pool to enshroud the target's heart and lungs in the fine veil of emerald, affected creatures become more fragile, getting -2 penalty to AC, the targeted creature has to pass Fortitude reflex saving throw (DC 19) or suffer 150% of bludgeoning damage till the end of the encounter.
